  16. (* Handling of dynamically-linked libraries *)

  18. (* Extract the name of a DLLs from its external name (xxx.so or -lxxx) *)
  19. ‌val extract_dll_name: string -> string

  21. ‌type dll_mode =
  22.   | For_checking     (* will just check existence of symbols;
  23.                         no need to do full symbol resolution *)
  24.   | For_execution    (* will call functions from this DLL;
  25.                         must resolve symbols completely *)

  27. (* Open a list of DLLs.  First argument indicates whether to perform
  28.    full symbol resolution.  Raise [Failure msg] in case of error. *)
  29. ‌val open_dlls: dll_mode -> string list -> unit

  31. (* Close all DLLs *)
  32. ‌val close_all_dlls: unit -> unit

  34. (* The abstract type representing C function pointers *)
  35. ‌type dll_address

  37. ‌type primitive_address =
  38.   | Prim_loaded of dll_address (* Primitive found in a DLL opened
  39.                                   "for execution" *)
  40.   | Prim_exists (* Primitive found in a DLL opened "for checking" *)

  42. (* Find a primitive in the currently opened DLLs and return its address.
  43.    Return [None] if the primitive is not found. *)
  44. ‌val find_primitive: string -> primitive_address option

  46. (* If linking in core (dynlink or toplevel), synchronize the VM
  47.    table of primitive with the linker's table of primitive
  48.    by storing the given primitive function at the given position
  49.    in the VM table of primitives.  *)
  50. ‌val synchronize_primitive: int -> dll_address -> unit

  52. (* Add the given directories at the head of the search path for DLLs *)
  53. ‌val add_path: string list -> unit

  55. (* Remove the given directories from the search path for DLLs *)
  56. ‌val remove_path: string list -> unit

  58. (* Initialization for separate compilation.
  59.    Initialize the DLL search path to the directories given in the
  60.    environment variable CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH, plus contents of ld.conf file
  61.    if argument is [false].  If argument is [true], ignore ld.conf. *)
  62. ‌val init_compile: bool -> unit

  64. (* Initialization for linking in core (dynlink or toplevel).
  65.    Initialize the search path to the same path that was used to start
  66.    the running program (CAML_LD_LIBRARY_PATH + directories in executable +
  67.    contents of ld.conf file).  Take note of the DLLs that were opened
  68.    when starting the running program. *)
  69. ‌val init_toplevel: string list -> unit

  71. ‌val reset: unit -> unit
